outputFlag.name: ORIGINAL_DOUBTFUL
outputFlag.description: Observed value retrieved from external data source. Value is valid, but marked as suspect due to soft validation limits being exceeded

outputFlag.name: COMPLETED_RELIABLE
outputFlag.description: Original value was missing. Value has been filled in through byteerpolation, transformation (e.g. stage discharge) or a model

outputFlag.name: ORIGINAL_RELIABLE
outputFlag.description: Observed value retrieved from external data source. Value is valid, marked as original reliable as validation is yet to be done

outputFlag.name: ORIGINAL_MISSING
outputFlag.description: Missing value in originally observed series. Note this is a special form of both ORIGINAL/UNRELIABLE and ORIGINAL/RELIABLE.

outputFlag.name: CORRECTED_RELIABLE
outputFlag.description: The original value was removed and corrected. Correction may be through byteerpolation or manual editing

outputFlag.name: ORIGINAL_DOUBTFUL
outputFlag.description: Observed value retrieved from external data source. Value is valid, but marked as suspect due to soft validation limits being exceeded

outputFlag.name: ORIGINAL_UNRELIABLE
outputFlag.description: Observed value retrieved from external data source. Value is invalid due to validation limits set. Value is removed.

outputFlag.description: Observed value retrieved from external data source. Value is invalid due to validation limits set. Value is removed.

defaultOuputFlag.description: The data value is the original value retrieved from an external source and it successfully passes all validation criteria set.
